channel.title: protoplasts on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in protoplasts on funPlantGenes

item.title: BRD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb050010 Gene Symbol: BRD1 Gene Name: brassinosteroid-deficient dwarf1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CaATL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaATL1 Gene Name: AT-hook-Like gene 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The chili pepper CaATL1: an AT-hook motif-containing transcription factor implicated in defence responses against pathogens.

item.title: CrWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Catharanthus roseus Functional Descriptions: Promoter analysis reveals cis-regulatory motifs associated with the expression of the WRKY transcription factor CrWRKY1 in Catharanthus roseus.

item.title: CsaARC5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa7G051430 Gene Symbol: CsaARC5 Gene Name: ACCUMULATION AND REPLICATION OF CHLOROPLASTS 5 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: By re-sequencing of bulked segregants, we identified the candidate gene Csa7G051430 encoding ACCUMULATION AND REPLICATION OF CHLOROPLASTS 5 (ARC5) that plays a vital role in chloroplast division in Arabidopsis.

item.title: GhMKK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_21502 Gene Symbol: GhMKK6 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase 6 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Scaffold protein GhMORG1 enhances the resistance of cotton to Fusarium oxysporum by facilitating the GhMKK6-GhMPK4 cascade.

item.title: GhMPK4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_19088 Gene Symbol: GhMPK4 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase 4 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Scaffold protein GhMORG1 enhances the resistance of cotton to Fusarium oxysporum by facilitating the GhMKK6-GhMPK4 cascade.

item.title: GhMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CotAD_32778 Gene Symbol: GhMYC2 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum (AD1) ‘TM-1’ genome CGP-BGI_v1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A novel mitogen-activated protein kinase (MAPK) cascade composed of GhMKK2, GhNTF6 and GhMYC2 was identified.

item.title: GmVTL1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G076300 Gene Symbol: GmVTL1b Gene Name: vacuolar iron transporter like 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmVTL1a and GmVTL1b are specifically expressed in the fixation zone of soybean nodules.

item.title: HvOle3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MLOC_7938.1 Gene Symbol: HvOle3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid activation of oleosin gene HvOle3 expression prevents the coalescence of protein storage vacuoles in barley aleurone cells.

item.title: HvPAP14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvPAP14 Gene Name: papain-like cysteine proteinase Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvPAP14, which belongs to the C1A family of cysteine proteases, was identified in senescing barley (Hordeum vulgare L.

item.title: LjMAMI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMAMI Gene Name: MYB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: An AM-induced, MYB-family gene of Lotus japonicus (LjMAMI) affects root growth in an AM-independent manner.

item.title: MdAO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000863012 Gene Symbol: MdAO1 Gene Name: Amine Oxidase 1 Genome: Apple Genome Database Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple Fruit Copper Amine Oxidase Isoforms: Peroxisomal MdAO1 Prefers Diamines as Substrates, Whereas Extracellular MdAO2 Exclusively Utilizes Monoamines.

item.title: MdAO2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000197462 Gene Symbol: MdAO2 Gene Name: Amine Oxidase 2 Genome: Apple Genome Database Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple Fruit Copper Amine Oxidase Isoforms: Peroxisomal MdAO1 Prefers Diamines as Substrates, Whereas Extracellular MdAO2 Exclusively Utilizes Monoamines.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSnRK2.3 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: StIPP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400016891 Gene Symbol: StIPP Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: In Arabidopsis protoplasts, expression of StIPP resulted in the stabilization of the PAMP receptor, FLAGELLIN-SENSITIVE 2, indicating that StIPP may act as a PAMP-induced and localized antagonist of PtdIns(4,5)P2-dependent processes during plant immunity.

item.title: TaARPC5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaARPC5 Gene Name: actin-related protein 2/3 complex subunit 5 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaARPC5 is required for resistance signaling against Pst infection, and moreover, its functions in this capacity are performed by regulating actin filament organization during infection.

item.title: TaClpS1-2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A02G022700.1 Gene Symbol: TaClpS1-2A Gene Name: caseinolytic peptidase adaptor protein Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaClpS1, negatively regulates wheat resistance against Puccinia striiformis f.

item.title: TaClpS1-2B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2B02G031800.1 Gene Symbol: TaClpS1-2B Gene Name: caseinolytic peptidase adaptor protein Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaClpS1, negatively regulates wheat resistance against Puccinia striiformis f.

item.title: TaClpS1-2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2D02G023900.1 Gene Symbol: TaClpS1-2D Gene Name: caseinolytic peptidase adaptor protein Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaClpS1, negatively regulates wheat resistance against Puccinia striiformis f.

item.title: TaHKT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaHKT1|5-D Gene Name: high-affinity potassium (K+) transporter Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Na+ transporter, TaHKT1|5-D|TaHKT1|5-D, limits shoot Na+ accumulation in bread wheat.

item.title: ZmWUS1-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZmWUS1-B Gene Name: WUS1 protein Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: ZmWUS1-B is controlled by a spontaneously generated novel promoter region that dramatically increases its expression and alters patterning and development of young ears.
